lookingForTalent.title: Looking for Talent?
lookingForTalent.whyMajorTitle: Why did I choose this major?
lookingForTalent.whyMajorDesc: At first, I was just tinkering with computers, but I ended up really enjoying the world of coding. I chose Informatics Engineering so I can code while relaxing, explore the latest technologies, and maybe even build my own startup someday. I want to be part of the exciting digital transformation thatâ€™s relevant to everyday life.
lookingForTalent.goalDesc: My goal is to become a skilled software engineer and contribute to innovative projects that make a difference in people's lives. I want to continuously learn and grow in my field, and eventually take on leadership roles where I can mentor others and drive positive change.
lookingForTalent.name: Rinaldi
